snippet.title: Steelrising | Jehanne Rousseau Interview
snippet.description:
Discover the universe of Steelrising alongside Jehanne ROUSSEAU, President of Studio Spiders.

Learn more about the inspirations, the mechanics and the history of this game which immerses you in the shoes of an automaton taking part in the French Revolution.

Steelrising will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S on September 8, 2022.

-------------------------------
For updates about #Steelrising, you can follow us on:

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/PlaySteelRising
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/PlaySteelRising
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/PlaySteelRising
